text: @MarkRuffalo @jrharrison1 @realDonaldTrump #Trump has blamed the #coronaVirus on a whole race of people? Have I missed a quote? I have #LymeDisease & it’s named after the town it originated in (& that also happens to be in influence-area of a bioweapons facility...). There’s more than 1 c.virus so needed a distinction.
